title: Calories in Cheesecake Factory Cheesecake
meta_description: Discover calories in cheesecake factory original slice, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better choices.
assumptions: One standard slice of Original Cheesecake from The Cheesecake Factory menu; includes graham cracker crust and cream cheese filling.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact recipe, portion size, location, and customizations; check the restaurant's menu or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A slice of Original Cheesecake from The Cheesecake Factory packs ~1,290 kcal with high fat and sugar content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

faqs.q: How many calories in cheesecake factory original slice?
What are the macros for calories in cheesecake factory cheesecake?
faqs.a: ≈84 g fat, 120 g carbs (99 g sugars), 19 g protein.

faqs.q: Is cheesecake factory cheesecake high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, one slice has ~99 g sugars from cream cheese and crust.

faqs.q: How does portion size affect calories in cheesecake factory?
faqs.a: Full slice is 1,290 kcal; half or junior sizes cut it to ~645 kcal.

faqs.q: Are there lower calorie options at cheesecake factory?
faqs.a: Yes, lighter cheesecakes or smaller portions range from 800–1,000 kcal.
